title: 27. The Acid Queen Olga Lorencin on Celebrity Skincare Lines, Sephora, Client Chemistry + Why Estheticians Are Like Gardeners.
description:
Hi Roomies!! In this episode, I'm chatting with the Acid Queen, Olga Lorencin. Olga is an esthetician behind some of the most famous faces in Hollywood including Halle Berry + Emma Stone. 

As a celebrity skincare guru Olga is known for achieving transformative results using original, custom-blended skincare cocktails. Olga’s passion was sparked growing up in Belgrade, where facials are customary as dental cleanings and skincare is approached as a science.

Learn Your Acids With Olga

https://olgalorencinskincare.com/pages/acid-guide

Connect with Olga on IG:

@olgalorencinskincare

Her website:

https://olgalorencinskincare.com

In this episode we talk:

- Client chemistry.

- How to handle difficult clients

- Why you don’t need celebrities or followers to be successful

- Rosacea misconceptions

- The magic of acids

- Why estheticians are like gardeners

- Celebrity skincare, Sephora and non-experts giving advice

Shop my Glymed Store

My Website

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa
